text:
SALEM

Department of Commerce of Periyar University and NABARD: International conference on ‘corporate and business response to climate change: from awareness to adoption’, John Mclaren, senior lecturer, School of Business, James Cook University, Singapore, inaugurates, Karthikeyan, Member Secretary, Tamil Nadu Pollution Control Board, Mohammad Abdul Hannan Mia, Professor, Department of Management Information Systems, University of Dhaka, Bangladesh, Desti Kannaiah, senior lecturer, School of Business, James Cook University, Singapore, speak, 10.15 a.m.

Periyar University: Department of Education, national seminar on ‘recent trends in educational research’, C. Swaminathan, Vice Chancellor, inaugurates, K. Kumaran, former professor, Department of Education, University of Madras, speaks, 10.30 a.m.; M. Manivannan, Registrar, delivers valedictory address, 4.15 p.m.

Knowledge Institute of Technology: Inauguration of Centre of Excellence on ‘Remote Sensing and GIS’, S. M. Ramasamy, former Vice Chancellor, Gandhigram Rural University, chief guest, P. S. S. Srinivasan, principal, presides,

10 a.m.

Sri Ganesh College of Education: Mass sapling planting campaign, M. Thangavel, Correspondent, Sankar, panchayat president, inaugurate, Mannarpalayam, 10 a.m.

Thiagarajar Polytechnic College and Sona College of Technology: Sona-Thiag Fiesta, Sports Day, K. S. Mohamed Nizammuddin, former international athlete, Kabeer R. Shetty, business head, IOT-Arsenal Soccer Schools, New Delhi, Lakshya Raghavan, unter -19 national Squash champion 2014, chief guests, 4 p.m.

Commissionerate of Central Excise: Tax Payers Day, Foulk’s Compound, Anal Medu, 9 a.m.

Muslim Youth Federation: Zikr majlis, Mettu street, 9 p.m.

Cooptex: Annual ‘buy two and get one free’ exhibition, Thangam Pattu Maaligai showroom, 10 a.m. to

8 p.m.

New Century Book House Limited: Book exhibition, Bose maidan, 9 a.m. to 9 p.m.

NAMAKKAL

Paavai Polytechnic College: NSS special camp, Panchayat Union Elementary School, Kurukkupuram,

3 p.m.

Cooptex: Annual ‘buy two and get one free’ exhibition, Cooptex showroom, 10 a.m. to 8 p.m.

TIRUCHENGODE

Sengunthar Engineering College: Women Empowerment Cell, International Women’s Day celebrations, Usha Devi Rajamanickam, principal, Sengunthar Matriculation Higher Secondary School, chief guest,

9.30 a.m.

KOMARAPALAYAM

SSM College of Engineering: Placement Cell, training on wind mill technology, P. R. Manikandan, Head of Department of Mechanical Engineering of the college, resource person, 9.30 a.m.

Excel College of Engineering and Technology: Department of ECE and EEE, national level technical symposium, 10 a.m.

Excel Group of Institutions: Department of Placement and Training, campus interview by Ambal Auto, Erode, for MBA students, 10.30 a.m.; campus interview for BE and MBA students by Hitech Communications, Erode, 12.30 p.m.

ERODE

Kongu Engineering College and National Human Rights Commission: Training programme on 'Human Rights' by Department of Management Studies, 9.30 a.m.

Nandha Engineering College: National-level Technical Symposium, talk by A. Athif Shah, ABE Technologies, Chennai, 10.00 a.m.

Erode Sengunthar Engineering College: Knowledge-sharing session on 'India's Economic Position', 'Managerial System of Dabbawala', and 'Indian Financial System',

4.00 p.m.

EBET Group of Institutions: Hindi language training, 4.15 p.m.
title: engagements
